scenes.background: You decided to let Monica and Bob handle the task. [Bob] seems a bit tense.
scenes.description: 'Thanks for trusting us. But honestly, was it really necessary to stay this long?' He frowns slightly.

options.text: I just wanted to ensure everything was on track before stepping back.
options.analysis: You show balanced emotional perception and self-regulation, but there could be better empathy and social skills.

options.text: You're right, Bob. I probably overthought it. You both got this.
options.analysis: You show strong self-regulation by acknowledging your overthinking, but empathy and motivation might be seen as lower.

options.text: I felt it was necessary, but I trust you to take it from here.
options.analysis: You show high emotional perception and empathy, but might overextend yourself, affecting self-regulation and motivation.
